content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='I-D.zorn-dime-capablities-update'> <front> <title>The Diameter Capabilities Update Application</title>  <author initials='G' surname='Zorn' fullname='Glen Zorn'>     <organization /> </author>  <author initials='J' surname='Kang' fullname='Jiao Kang'>     <organization /> </author>  <date month='April' day='12' year='2009' />  <abstract><t>This document defines a new Diameter application and associated command codes.  The Capabilities Update application is intended to allow the dynamic update of Diameter peer capabilities while the peer-to-peer connection is in the open state.</t></abstract>  </front>  <seriesInfo name='Internet-Draft' value='draft-zorn-dime-capablities-update-01' /> <format type='TXT'         target='http://www.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft-zorn-dime-capablities-update-01.txt' /> </reference>
